statements: DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 100 AND authorized_access = TRUE;
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE record_id = 10 AND patient_id = 100;
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE record_date < '2022-01-01' AND diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' AND authorized_access = true;
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'login' AND user_id = 67890;
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 123 AND diagnosis = 'Fever';
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 456 AND action = 'login';
DELETE FROM AccessLogs WHERE user_id = 100 AND action = 'VIEW'
DELETE FROM breach_reports WHERE patient_id = 200 AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM doctors WHERE doctor_id = 201 AND hospital_id = 301;
